item.title: Nighty, Night
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Currently it's 11:00PM and time for us kids to be in bed. This is blog entry number one! I RUULE! Hopefully I will get off my fat ass and continue writing blog entries in this new and exciting blog. Of course I don't need to get off my ass to write in the blog, but you get the point. Oh and I finally bought an XBOX game Splinter Cell, Pandora's Tommorow. It's pretty sweet. Hard. But sweet. And to all a good night!
